attributes.action: Petition to remove the coalition government from power
attributes.additional_details:
I'd like to suggest a change of government, before the current one does irreparable damage to the structure and economy of the UK.

Pricing large parts of the country out of a university education, attempting to destroy the NHS, repeatedly targeting the poorest members of an already struggling population, allowing the bankers at the heart of the financial crisis to go entirely unpunished, failing to tax those who owe the most and doing all of the above with an air of barely concealed glee, just a few of the charges.

I declare the current government unfit to rule and would like to see a new general election called.
